steps.content: This sign shares Aries' preference for total honesty and directness. Tell your Sagittarius how you feel about him, especially if he asks. steps.content: Sagittarius guys love freedom and don't want a controlling partner. [8] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021.
